name: World of Morphies
description:
Welcome to the world of morphy's

explore the world, fight enemies, customize your morphy with goober drops to exchange it stats..

This is just a fun little game i did for a challenge that i have to use the games factory to make a game, and i think i did well, i hope lmao

Disclaimer, the game is just for fun, theres no serious things i put into this game
